import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react' import mainContext from '../context/mainContext' const EnemyBox = () => { const {socket, setLogedinUser, logedinUser, enemy} = useContext(mainContext) return (
{enemy ? ( <>

Player: {enemy.username}

{enemy.username} money: {enemy.money}

Lives left: {enemy.points}

) :

Waiting for user to join

}
) } export default EnemyBox
